description:
Chihaya is getting no sleep because she`s making clothes and costumes. What is Ichimiya`s reaction to her saying she wants to take time off so she can finish her costumes? Also, the day of Hasebe and Lucy`s date finally arrives. Hasebe can`t hide his excitement, while Lucy can`t help but have reservations about the outfit Chihaya made for her...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Attends un peu, habitude et imprudence sont fatales
Chotto Mate Nare to Yudan ga Inochitori
Wait a Moment, Being Accustomed and Being Unprepared Are Life Threatening
一寸待て 慣れと油断が 命取り
